00020 #include <stdio.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <errno.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include "libphonefirewall.h" 
00025 
00026 typedef struct Blacklist blacklist_t;
00027 typedef struct Whitelist whitelist_t;
00028 
00029 blacklist_t *add_to_blacklist(blacklist_t *node, long long int number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00030         printf("%llu", number);
00031         if( NULL == node ) {
00032                 node = (blacklist_t *)malloc(sizeof(blacklist_t));
00033                 if( NULL == node ) exit(-ENOMEM);
00034                 node->number = number;
00035                 node->name = name;
00036                 node->reason = reason;
00037                 node->priority = priority;
00038                 node->left = node->right = NULL;
00039         } 
00040         else if( node->number >= number )
00041                 node->left = add_to_blacklist(node->left, number, name, reason, priority);
00042         else if( node->number < number )
00043                 node->right = add_to_blacklist(node->right, number, name, reason, priority);
00044 
00045         return node;
00046 }
00047 
00048 whitelist_t *add_to_whitelist(whitelist_t *node, long long int number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00049         if( NULL == node ) {
00050                 node = (whitelist_t *)malloc(sizeof(whitelist_t));
00051                 if( NULL == node ) exit(-ENOMEM);
00052                 node->number = number;
00053                 node->name = name;
00054                 node->reason = reason;
00055                 node->priority = priority;
00056                 node->left = node->right = NULL;
00057         } 
00058         else if( node->number >= number )
00059                 node->left = add_to_whitelist(node->left, number, name, reason, priority);
00060         else if( node->number < number )
00061                 node->right = add_to_whitelist(node->right, number, name, reason, priority);
00062 
00063         return node;
00064 }
00065 
00066 int add_blacklist_entry(long long int number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00067 
00068         blacklist_t *root = NULL;
00069         root = add_to_blacklist(root, number, name, reason, priority);
00070 
00071         return 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 int rm_blacklist_entry (long long int number) {
00075         return -ENOSYS;
00076 }
00077 
00078 int add_whitelist_entry (long long int number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00079         return -ENOSYS;
00080 }
00081 
00082 int rm_whitelist_entry (long long int number) {
00083         return -ENOSYS;
